籤詩版本二:
Qin Jun na-edi ndụ nchekwa ma kpebisie ike na ya agaghị eme ihe ọjọọ.
Ruo mgbe mmadụ ji nwayọọ na-eme ihe ike, alaka ndị nwụrụ anwụ na osisi ochie ga-emegharị okooko osisi.
詩意:
Hexagram a dị ka ifuru osisi nwụrụ anwụ.
Ihe niile nwere ihe ịga nke ọma nke ya.
解曰: Na-eche nche na jụụ. Ihe na-emezu. Ọ bụrụ na ọ na-akwali, a ga-enwe ọtụtụ ọdachi. Enweghị ụta na ịgbachi nkịtị.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Weishui ịkụ azụ
Na usoro ndị eze Zhou, Jiang Shang, aha ya bụ Ziya, mụrụ na Ji (onye si Xuzhou, East China Sea), na aha Taoist bụ Fei Xiong. E nyere nna nna ahụ aha Zai Lu (aha ebe), n'ihi ya, a na-akpọkwa ya Lu Wang.
Iji gbanarị oge nsogbu nke Eze Zhou nke usoro ọchịchị Shang, Jiang Ziya bi n'akụkụ mmiri nke Oké Osimiri East China ma na-akụ azụ na Osimiri Weishui.
Nkọ azụ̀ kwụ ọtọ, n'ezie, obi ya adịghị egbu azụ, ma ọchịchọ ya bụ ịbụ praịm minista.
Eze Wen nuru na o nwere amamihe wee were ya n'oru dika onye nkuzi (prime Minister). (Jiang Ziya dị afọ iri asatọ n'oge ahụ)
Ka e mesịrị, Eze Wu nke Zhou wakporo Eze Zhou nke Shang, bibie usoro ndị eze Shang, ma guzobe usoro ndị eze Zhou. Eze Wu kpọrọ Jiang Ziya Shangfu. Nwa Feng Jiang, Ding Gong, ghọrọ Marquis nke Qi.
(Akụkọ a bụ ihe atụ: chere ohere, chere ruo mgbe enwere ohere ịkpalite, mgbe ahụ mmepe ga-amalite.)
聖意: Ezinaụlọ, ụlọ na akụ na ụba, oge eruo, azụmahịa ga-aga nke ọma, ọ bụrụ na a mụọ nwa agbọghọ na Liujia, ndị na-agafe agafe ga-egbochi ubi, silkworm ga-egbochi, anụ ụlọ isii ga-esi ike ịchọta ezi mma. chioma n'ikpe ohaneze, mbughari, nkpado anya, ihe efu, oria, na ihe oma.Ugwu na ili.
第X籤: Lọtrị mmeri nke iri anọ na isii
